title: We Rent Hollywood
posting_body: ['South Florida’s #1 Rental Broker is seeking well qualified tenants for homes throughout Broward.', 'Thousands of rental properties available both on and off the market.', '\xa0 Most units are private landlords.', '2 bedrooms starting as low as $2000/month.', '\xa0 Apartments, condos, townhomes, single family homes, duplexes, 55 an over, no HOA.', 'One call rents them all.', 'We’re a totally free service to you, we are paid by the landlords when you move in.', 'The quickest way to see your listings is on our website.', '<URL>', 'Minimum requirements:', '700 Credit Score', '1st, last, and security.', '(3 times the amount of the rent)', 'Verifiable income of at least $5000/month before taxes..', 'No felonies.', 'No evictions.', 'No large dogs/aggressive breeds.', 'Ravi Malhotra', 'Broker', 'License #BK3276048', 'American 100 Realty', 'show contact info', '<URL>']
